text: Sonia Darrin (n√©e Paskowitz; June 16, 1924 - July 19, 2020) was an American movie actress. She was best known for her role in The Big Sleep and in Frankenstein Meets the Wolf Man.Sonia Paskowitz in the 1940 United States Census Her brother was surfer Doc Paskowitz. Darrin died on July 19, 2020 at a hospital in New York City, aged 96.Sonia Darrin, Femme Fatale in Bogart's 'The Big Sleep,' Dies at 96 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1924 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Texas Category:People from Galveston, Texas
title: Sonia Darrin
